title: US Oil Industry Busted For “One Of The Most Successful Antitrust Conspiracies” In US History
description:
The Michigan State Attorney General has filed an antitrust lawsuit against BP, Chevron, Exxon Mobil, Shell, and oil industry organizations, citing a 50-year effort to illegally restrain competition from renewable energy.

The post US Oil Industry Busted For “One Of The Most Successful Antitrust Conspiracies” In US History appeared first on CleanTechnica.
